name: Witch's Brew (Ariel Miz, Keshetsol)
description:
A little witch got distracted while looking for potion ingredients in the forest and got lost. Now, she has to find her way back home by making the right potions, and make it before night falls.

Game Design & Developers: Ariel Mizrachi & Keshet Mendicini

Original music & sound effects: Omri Lahav

Art by: @Trixie and @9E0
